protein.specific_function: Involved in transport from the endoplasmic reticulum to the Golgi apparatus. Required to maintain SEC16A localization at discrete locations on the ER membrane perhaps by preventing its dissociation. SAR1A-GTP-dependent assembly of SEC16A on the ER membrane forms an organized scaffold defining endoplasmic reticulum exit sites (ERES)

reference.reference_text: South ST, Sacksteder KA, Li X, Liu Y, Gould SJ: Inhibitors of COPI and COPII do not block PEX3-mediated peroxisome synthesis. J Cell Biol. 2000 Jun 26;149(7):1345-60.
